Class.Name: ActiveRecord
Class.Description: Active record design pattern for ORM DB access

Function.Name: create
Function.Description: Creates an active record with an SQLite connection to a database file

Function.Name: connect
Function.Description: Creates an SQLite connection to a database file

Function.Name: tables
Function.Description: Returns the tables in a database

Function.Name: fields
Function.Description: Returns the fields of a table

Function.Name: backup
Function.Description: Creates a backup the database

Function.Name: restore
Function.Description: Restores a database from a backup

Function.Name: clear
Function.Description: Deletes all records and vacuum's the database

Function.Name: execute_sql
Function.Description: Executes an SQL command with no result

Function.Name: add
Function.Description: Adds values to the database

Function.Name: update
Function.Description: Updates values of an object

Function.Name: get_object_list
Function.Description: Returns the ID of objects matching a criteria

Function.Name: get_object_count
Function.Description: Returns the number of objects matching a criteria

Function.Name: get_object_list_by
Function.Description: Returns the fields of objects matching a criteria

Function.Name: find
Function.Description: Finds an object with a matching ID

Function.Name: find_by
Function.Description: Finds the first object with a matching field and value

Function.Name: set
Function.Description: Sets the value of the object

Function.Name: get
Function.Description: Returns the field value of an object

Function.Name: get_by
Function.Description: Returns the list of field value of the all object matching a field an value

Function.Name: get_unique_by
Function.Description: Returns the field value of the first object matching a field an value

Function.Name: get_all
Function.Description: Returns all fields of objects matching a criteria

Function.Name: delete
Function.Description: Deletes an object with a matching ID

Function.Name: delete_by
Function.Description: Deletes all objects matching a field and value
